goal.en: This course focus on the design of reinforced concrete structures.
goal.ch: 明瞭鋼筋混凝土結構之鋼筋配置設計

content.en:
1. Development length
2. Cracks and Deflections control
3. RC column design
4. Slender RC column
5.RC slab design
content.ch:
1. 鋼筋之伸展與續接
2. 受撓構材之裂紋與撓度控制
3. 柱設計
4. 細長柱
5. 樓版設計

textbook.en: 鋼筋混凝土學(土木406-111) 科技圖書
textbook.ch: 鋼筋混凝土學(土木406-111) 科技圖書

grading.ch: 小考:20% 期中考:40% 期末考:40%

flex_desc.ch: 線上課程影片彈性學習

domain.en: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程 、 材料工程
domain.ch: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程 、 材料工程

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI3005 only.With an average of 60 or above for Required Subjects.
ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修CI3005。且檢定指定課程平均成績達60分以上。
